name: Max Boost
description:
Race down hallways of obstacles and get your best personal record! Various types of challenges to get past for the different levels!

Racing not for you? No worries! Jump into Free Fly and fly around the broken world, shoot through boost rings and just relax!

How to play?
W, A, S, D = Movement
Mouse = Look around
Space = Jump while not flying
F = Flight
Left Shift = Sprint while flying
Left Mouse Button = Boost the character speed when the light on his back turns green

TIPS

- Hit boost rings to increase your speed even more
- Avoid hitting walls as this will reset your speed
- If you stop sprinting, your speed will reset

Check out the Credits page to see assets that were used!

More will be added to this game in the future such as a leaderboards page, more obstacles, character customization, more special effects, more maps, maybe a map builder or procedural generator, a level up system and possibly even multiplayer!
